item.title: user
item.description: Adding a ordinary user rlwrap adduser sally Initially, only the account name and passwords are important. Other fields can be left empty. Account name should be lower-case! then execute this THEM=sally HOUSE=/home/$THEM chmod 700 $HOUSE mkdir -p $HOUSE/.ssh chmod 700 $HOUSE/.ssh touch $HOUSE/.ssh/authorized_keys chown -R $THEM.$THEM $HOUSE Replace sally with appropriate user name. Public key of the user should who should have access should go into authorized_keys cat /tmp/sally.pubkey >> /home/sally/.
